hackathon-description-text: Finding technology and business solutions to pressing social issues in Pakistan.
hackathon-eligibility: Anyone who came to hack/reduce for #pakathon
hackathon-requirements: Each submission must have an executive summary as well as any visuals of the demo, website info, app info, powerpoints that might apply.
hackathon-rules: Each team will be given two minutes to pitch to our panel of judges. Our judges will pick a shortlist for further questions.

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion:
How widespread is the problem that the product/service is trying to fix?

Is the solution a good fit for the problem?

Does the team have a plan to implement and scale the project?

Does it have a revenue model?

How well does the demo function?

Does it have an elegant look and feel?

How intuitive is the interface?

hackathon-description-header: Boston | Lahore | Islamabad Hackathon for Pakistan
